ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Lost Dugeons of Norrath
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Heh. When I had dialup I went to load a patch and it said it was going to take over 80 hours to load. I was like Hell no! I m glad I have satellite for
ygData.messageBody:
> I did something really stupid last night. I logged into Everquest and
> opted to purchase LDoN online. One suggestion, DON'T do it if you
> have a 56K dial-up connection LOL. It started to download and said it
> would take 22 hours and 26 minutes! I guess I will take my laptop to
> work and download it on the T1 LOL. Sheesh!
>
Heh. When I had dialup I went to load a patch and it said it was going to
take over 80 hours to load. I was like "Hell no!"
I'm glad I have satellite for download now.
I had started to play and was going to do a lost dungeon adventure but my
brother was a prick and he got me disconnected and then I couldn't get back
in.
luv,
-Su
